name: Klinklang
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.

abilities.name: Plasma Steel
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to your {M} Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Heavy Bullet
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
